definition: (of an expanse of water) vast/distant and indistinct/tiny or insignificant

sentences.english: He spat at the lonely cigarette, misty smoke wind.
sentences.chinese: 他吐着寂寞的烟卷，飘渺的烟雾随风而散。

sentences.english: Now, the most tenuous of news reports has ramped the talk up again.
sentences.chinese: 目前这则最飘渺的新闻报道再一次被重提。

sentences.english: The drum of water current concuss , in the heart of aery absentminded, exactly is who is act in cooperation who?
sentences.chinese: 水流的鼓荡，心中的飘渺恍惚，到底是谁在呼应着谁？

sentences.english: The fugacious past destined to be my single vermilion mark.
sentences.chinese: 飘渺前尘，注定只成为我一个人的朱砂墨迹。

sentences.english: But his ideal is in air.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的理想却是虚无飘渺的。

sentences.english: It translates these purported interactions into a mode perceivable and tangible to man.
sentences.chinese: 将这些飘渺的互动翻译为人可理解的确凿的。

sentences.english: His music will fill the air of my gypsy wagon indeterminately.
sentences.chinese: 乐声飘渺，在我的吉普赛旅行车中缭绕。

sentences.english: The other was an ethereal blonde, her gaze dreamy and distant.
sentences.chinese: 另一位则是个苗条的金发女孩，她的眼神飘渺而幽远。

sentences.english: To become more and more my life does not feel up to become misty .
sentences.chinese: 我的生活渐渐变得没有质感，变得飘渺了起来。

sentences.english: They painted a bit of a career veneer over the last year.
sentences.chinese: 他们去年就向我描绘一些飘渺的工作前景了。

sentences.english: "Who serve what master rinse face and comb hair?"The voice of clear orchid still has some aery.
sentences.chinese: “谁服侍老爷梳洗的？”明兰的声音还有些飘渺。

sentences.english: Often stretched to the mysterious mist, below the snowline increased the illusion.
sentences.chinese: 常伸展到雪线以下飘渺的云雾，增加了这种幻觉。

sentences.english: There were slight birds of light disturbing the sea.
sentences.chinese: 那儿有飘渺的亮光打扰那海洋。

sentences.english: Happiness is so uncertain but also the hazes of real existence.
sentences.chinese: 幸福就是这样的飘渺不定却也真实的存在着。

sentences.english: Frank has a lot of ideas, but they are merely stardust .
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克有许多想法，但它们只不过是虚无飘渺的梦想。

sentences.english: Have a kind of fuzzy beauty though.
sentences.chinese: 具有了一种虚无飘渺的模糊美。

definition: variant of 飄渺|飘渺[piao1 miao3]
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
The Goddess, 1934 silent film about a Shanghai prostitute, directed by 吳永剛|吴永刚[Wu2 Yong3 gang1]
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
unreal/illusory/imaginary/vague and with nothing in it
